Race.SpecificTitle: Rogers Nebo Fire District -- 5 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Rogers Nebo Fire District of LaSalle Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $42,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities and equipment to provide fire protection and emergency medical services, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
